excerpt: "Some artificial intelligence (AI) companies continue to get the lion's share of attention. You know the names: OpenAI, Nvidia and Google, among others. But those companies are only the tip of the iceberg. Many others are doing big things without making nearly as much public noise. Here are the top AI companies you've probably never heard of."
